scripts.build: npm run build:landing && npm run build:login && npm run build:signup && npm run build:headerAdmin && npm run build:headerCustomer && npm run build:sidebarAdmin && npm run build:sidebarCustomer && npm run build:baseCustomer && npm run build:profileDisplay && npm run build:profileUpdate
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/MainPageCustomer/style.css -o ./dist/MainPageCustomer/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/MainPageAdmin/style.css -o ./dist/MainPageAdmin/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/LandingPage/style.css -o ./dist/LandingPage/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/LoginPage/style.css -o ./dist/LoginPage/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/SignupPage/style.css -o ./dist/SignupPage/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/HeaderAdmin/style.css -o ./dist/HeaderAdmin/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/HeaderCustomer/style.css -o ./dist/HeaderCustomer/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/SidebarAdmin/style.css -o ./dist/SidebarAdmin/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/SidebarCustomer/style.css -o ./dist/SidebarCustomer/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/ProfileDisplayCustomer/style.css -o ./dist/ProfileDisplayCustomer/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/ProfileUpdateCustomer/style.css -o ./dist/ProfileUpdateCustomer/style.css --watch"
